lines.text: So who are you? Are you-you, like, some special forces guy or something?
Nah. I'm just a cook.
A cook?

[whispering]
Just a lowly, lowly cook.
Oh, my God, we're gonna die.
What made you flip like this?
I got tired of coming up with last-minute desperate solutions to impossible problems created by other fucking people.

All of your ridiculous pitiful antics aren't gonna change a thing. You and me, we're puppets in the same sick game. We serve the same master, and he's a lunatic and he's ungrateful. But there's nothing we can do about it. You and me, we're the same.
Oh, no. No, no, no. There's a difference, my man. You have faith. I don't!
[a knife fight erupts between them]
You're incredible, Ryback. It's a shame you're not cooking for *us*.
[Jordan shoots Doumer in the back]

[to Jordan]
Next thing I know, you'll be dating musicians.

[Krill has informed Ryback that all the men in the Forecastle are about to drown]
We've got to save them.
You know they're gonna have a trap for us.
Yeah, but they're expecting *me*, not all of us.
All of what? I do laundry. I was ironing during the Gulf War. I ain't cut out for this hero bullshit.
You're in the Navy, remember? It's not a job, it's an adventure!

Now, since your ass is on the line, sailor, I authorize you right now, to do whatever you can to aid in the arrival of the SEAL Team. Because if I goddamn can't control you, I might as well support you. Correct?
That's affirmative, sir!
[Tate runs after Ryback during a gunfight]
The safest place on this ship is right behind you.
Where are you going?
Make Honolulu glow in the dark.
Outstanding.
Petty Officer Ryback.
Ensign Taylor.
SIR!
You don't have to "sir" me, Ensign Taylor. We're casual in the galley, you know.
I'd watch it, Ryback. We still have a week together.
I guess that means I won't get to see you go through puberty.
You're not a cook.
Yeah, well... I also cook.
Look, Bill, if this is about reliving the 60's, you can forget about it, buddy. The movement is dead.

movement. It moves a certain distance, then it stops, you see? A revolution gets its name by always coming back around in your face. You tried to kill me you son of a bitch... so welcome to the revolution.
[Commander Krill spits in Ryback's soup]
A little flavor.

[taunts Ryback]
You like that?

[shoves Krill]
You're crazy...
HEY! That's *striking an Officer*!
Whoa, whoa.
COME ON! That's not striking an Officer...
[knocks Krill to the ground hard]
THAT'S striking an Officer!
[Ryback fights off the Marine guards successfully, then gives up and is restrained]
THROW HIM IN THE BRIG!

[as he is being handcuffed]
NOBODY goes to the brig without the Old Man's signature!
Good point. Secure him in the meat locker. NOW! Right now.
[as Ryback is being led in]
Now I know why you're a cook. You hit like a FAGGOT!
Any sign of Wile E. Coyote?
No. Meet at the bird cage as planned, Roadrunner, out!
You're the roadrunner?
Yeah, never been caught. Mee-meep.

[answers the satellite phone]
Hello?
Who in the hell in this?
Who in the hell is *this*?
This is Admiral Bates speaking. I am trying to get a hold of Chief Ryback. Is he about?
He's in a gunfight right now. I'm gonna have to take a message.
[Jordan refuses to hide in the closet despite the risks]
I hate being alone.
Do you hate being dead?
[Krill reads his personal file while he is still dressed as a drag queen]

"In the past few weeks, Commander Krill has become increasingly hostile to the crew, possibly due to anger over my last reviews of his performance. I recommend he be given a psychological evaluation before taking over his next ASSIGNMENT!"
[slams file on table]
Do I look like I need a psychological evaluation?
Not at all.
...I gotta change.
Mr. Strannix... this is Admiral Bates speaking. Would you please tell us why the hell you're doing this?

Hi, Admiral. Six months ago, your boy Tom Breaker cancelled operation 'Cleopatra', and shortly thereafter two young men from Langley showed up in Miami tried to cancel me along with it. Now you *did* receive each man's right forefinger in the mail, didn't you Tom?

[pause]
TOM!
Yes, I did.

[incredulous]
Did you expect us to wait in Miami for you to try again?
Al right, who are you and what are you doing here?

My name is Jordan Tate. I'm Miss July '89. I was hired to jump out of the cake, but I got really airsick on the way over here so this guy gave me these pills and I don't know what happened, and I guess I fell asleep.
What kind of babbling bullshit is this?
Okay, you're gonna need about three or four stitches so I wanna see you down in the infirmary.
Yeah, I'm afraid of needles, ya know.
[Tate and Ryback are hurrying down a corridor when they hear pounding on a door]
It's morse code.
What are they saying?
They're saying, "Get me the fuck out of here".
Another cold day in Hell.
I'll tell you what. I'll carry everything if you kill whoever we run into, all right?
I do not kill people, okay?
I'm thrilled to death to hear that, yeah. But it leaves a lot of open territory.
Private Nash, you came on board in Hawaii?
Yes, sir!

Then you don't know about Chief Ryback. He is an extreme psychopath. He hates officers. He hates America. This is the Captain's birthday. I do not want him ruining it. No one is to speak to him. No one is to let him out. If he tries to escape, shoot him right *here*!
[taps Nash directly between the eyes]
I'm counting on you.
Yes, sir!

[to everyone else]
Let's go.
[after a bomb explodes in the galley's microwave]
What the hell was that?
That was a bomb, jackass! He used the microwave as a detonator!
[to nearest man]
Come here! You secure everything between here and the CIC. You spot anything, you radio at once for backup. You don't get creative, you call for help. You understand? Move!
[man leaves]
PUT THESE FIRES OUT!
[to Krill]
I would like to see the ship's personnel file on this "plain and simple cook", Mr. Krill!
Yes, sir.
PUT OUT THESE GODDAMN *FIRES*!
[after getting off the phone with Krill]
You're WRONG Ryback! You're WRONG! Those were *party poppers*!
You got shit for brains, Private! I know they brainwashed you at boot camp, but sometimes you gotta QUESTION authority! Trust me, boy. That's GUNFIRE! You get me out of here, I'll go take care of it.
I'm gonna be relieved in a couple of minutes. So just shut up and sit tight!
Some thing's going on! Use your head this time, boy. Do what you got to do and get me out of here.
[pause]
When I get out, I'll shoot you myself!
Krill's a maniac! Go tell the captain he spit in my soup!
Ryback, you've got a fire in here!
Get my pies out of the oven!
[after receiving a call from Nash in the galley]
Anything else you forgot to tell us about? Any other little memory losses or oversights, perhaps?
No other little memory losses or oversights perhaps. There's two men, one of them's locked up. And I'll take care of him...
No, no, no. We'll handle it. Secure the galley. Send Cates, send Ziggs.
You got it.
This Marine's armed, Bill. I think we should send more, I'll go...
Don't worry about it. These guys are professionals. They can handle twenty Marines, and a hundred cooks.
You're a maniac. Drowning your own crew.
They never liked me anyway.
I bet they fuckin' love ya now, huh?
You're comin' with me, you gotta be invisible. You walk by a hatch and you see the enemy, you become the hatch.
[watching the camera feed from the Harpoon missile, which suddenly goes blank]
Bang, you're dead.
[Krill found Ryback's personnel file]
Ryback's file wasn't IN personnel. It was in the Captain's private cabinet. Ryback is an ex-SEAL.
The Goddamn cook's a SEAL!

Shut up and listen. "Expert in Martial Arts, Explosives, Weapons and Tactics. Silver Star, Navy Cross, Purple Heart with Cluster. Security Clearance revoked after Panama." That means he couldn't hold any rating except that of a yeoman or a cook. How little did I know.
We just lost two more men in the Engine Room!
I told you I don't like guns.
I know. Neither do I.
[Strannix is very impressed with Ryback's abilities]
Doumer, Doumer, Doumer. Why didn't you hire this person? I don't know what his price would have been, but it would have been WORTH it.
Calaway, Gunner's Mate.
Yeah, Chief?
You see those?
[pointing to the 16" guns]
We still got shells for those.
Johnson, how is the Captain gonna authorize a surprise birthday party for himself?
Let this be a learning experience, gentleman. If you resist we will kill you and the man next to you. Now move out of here in an orderly fashion.
[pauses]
Now!
All of my life... Saturday morning cartoons. The best.
Keep the faith, Strannix.
Chief, get in your dress uniform.
Sir, you know how I feel about ceremonies. I thought maybe this time, uh...
You know, if I had your ribbons, I'd wear 'em to bed.

[after hearing some enemy gunfire at what was supposedly his birthday party, after the terrorists have revealed themselves]
What the hell's going on?
The party's just beginning.
[He reveals a gun and shoots the Captain]

[on stage]
Now, you, sir, you are the highest-ranking officer in this room.
That's right. The operations officer. Third in command.
It's a pleasure to meet you, Commander Green.
[takes out a gun and shoots Commander Green in the forehead]
[looking at the Tomahawks]
These things are gonna sell like hotcakes!
Absolutely.
What are you gonna do when you get two hundred million dollars in the bank?
Buy the presidency!
[sees the bodies of the two commandos that Ryback has killed]
The man that did this is a professional. Who is he, and what's he doing running around on my battleship, Mr. Krill?
Your battleship? You wouldn't be on this battleship if it wasn't for me. He's a cook, plain and simple...
This is not the work of a cook.
He came on board with the captain. I know his routine, front and back. He's good with cooking knives...
[Strannix rips the throwing knife out of Cates's jugular and holds it up to Krill's face]
*Cooking knives*?
He got lucky. In my professional opinion, he is a military *reject* in command of a GALLEY!
[They hear beeping, and Strannix glances toward the microwave]
GET DOWN!
[Everyone ducks as the microwave explodes]
[Strannix goes to the firing triggers for the Tomahawks]
This little piggy went to market...
[flips the first trigger]
This little piggy stayed home...
[flips the second]
And this little piggy... oh, mama... oh, mama... went wee, wee, wee, WEEEEEEEEE...!
[flips the last]
ALL THE WAY HOME!
[He air-guitars "The Star-Spangled Banner" as the missile takes off]
[Luigi says something in Italian]
What'd he say?
He said he can't fix it.

[annoyed]
*I'll* fix it! Go, now!
[to Luigi]
Why can't you speak English?

[long stream of Italian, then... ]
Fuck you!
Just last year we found out North Korea was refitting an old French sub to fire anti-ship missile, so we sent Mr. Stranix in.
You've been financing this goddamn maniac's private army, and it didn't occur to you it might become a problem?
Once we realized we had lost positive control, under Executive Order 136 we tried to neutralize him... we missed.
Excuse me, um, this North Korean sub... how do you know he sunk it?

[in trembling voice]
Oh, we're positive he sunk it. Positive.
[Trenton smiles mockingly, because Breaker's trembling voice makes it clear that he is NOT positive at all]

[over the intercom]
Chief Ryback.
Sir?
I see you completely disobeyed my orders.
I'm sorry, sir. You can court martial me if I live, sir.
[Casey and Jordan hear the SEAL team's chopper approaching]
Here come the good guys.
But what would be the consequences of those missiles dropping on Honololu?
Colonel Sarnac?
Approximately one million people will reach ten thousand degrees Farenheit in less than a second.

[after successfully taking the Missouri]
Four minutes ahead of schedule. Damn, I'm good.
Daffy... Porky Pig... Little red fucker with the mustache...
Shit! I lost the Phalanx, the whole thing's dead, we're sitting ducks!

[on the phone]
Listen, Francois, put the money in the bank in Zurich by midnight or nothing's gonna happen.
[He holds the phone away from his ear as Francois curses explosively]

[aside to Doumer]
Call Chicago, sell everything we got in MacGregor Aircraft, that stock is gonna go to shit when they find out what's going on out here.
Two choppers, think they can sneak in under our radar.
Strike team.
[into phone]
'Course we drive a hard bargain, Francois, you're gonna get a hard value... listen, mon ami, you give me any more trouble, I'm calling Mohammed! You understand?
Strike team is in range and locked on.
Kill 'em.
[Francois starts to protest]
No, no, Francois, not you, not you. Now listen, I'm gonna put my accountant on the line, you understand, I'm gonna give you the account numbers, okay?
[hands the phone to Doumer]
Here, talk to that frog.
